STORY: When you come over to my place, you leave your axe at the door!

xe cắt lúa

ELEMENT: metal; gold; broom; grains of rice
STORY: A monk won a gold metal for breaking the current record for most swept rice in one minute.
Peel off the outside of the broom that sweeps up rice grains to reveal a saber.
In a hurry to tidy up before guests arrive, you're feverishly sweeping with a bunch of brooms bound together, your heart pounding.

In high society, a lady is a woman who never touches a broom or an apron.
Whether I SWEEP something away with my FINGERS or my BROOM, I should always wear my APRON.
Some mothersuse a small broom to hit their children when they misbehave.

ust one word about this matter from your mouth and you will find this rake across it.

The Tang juice was created in China in the T'ANG dinasty. The T'ANG emperor discovered that certain caves walls had a very sweet smell, so he raked the walls of one of them and put the rake into his mouth. This way he discovered that tasty powder that nowadays is known as TANG juice.
君 [kimi] is said by the old boy to he younger boy, never the other way around as it would be an insult.
